pageContext.claim: “Fake news. How do you do a story like that and you don't call the principal? I would give them a quote. I would say it's not true and that's the end of their story. But they don't do that. They write and then they make up sources. They may speak to one person, but they make up phony sources.”
pageContext.analysis: Mainstream news organizations do not make up sources; it is a firing offense.
